short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your PERSONAL FB PROFILE into a super-powerful CHATBOT AUTORESPONDER

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-respond to messages sent to your FB Profile based on keywords, or with a default message (such as an "out of office" message"
